name: neto-desktop
description: Generic types are designed to reduce the codes duplications.

scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.prod.js | tee -a logs/build-production_`date +%Y-%m-%d`.txt && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: cp dist/app.bundle.js neto/built/desktop.bundle.js && cp dist/core.bundle.js neto/built/core.bundle.js

author: Fisher
